               <font face="Verdana">
                The Buyback Letter was named to The Hulbert 2017-2018 Investment Newsletter Honor Roll. This is the  eighth year in a row The Buyback Letter had been honored for this! There were only 7 that made the
                <a href="http://hulbertratings.com/honor-roll/" target="_blank">
                 Honor Roll.
                </a>
                To be in this select group, a newsletter must exhibit above-average performance in both up AND down markets.
               </font>
              </strong>
             </font>
             <br/>
            </p>

            "Not only have the newsletter’s portfolios  outperformed a buy-and-hold, they have done so with slightly less risk than the  overall market .......... That’s a winning combination,.."
           </strong>

              <br/>

              A full-service monthly newsletter for investors who like
                     more explanation and information. The newsletter includes
                     buy, sell and hold instructions, a featured article, a choice
                     of six model portfolios with a range of risk and activity
                     each month, news briefs, charts and weekly hotlines -- everything
                     you need to know about investing in companies that repurchase
                     their own shares. (

             A focused, high-octane strategy for experienced investors only, 
                   with a single 5-stock portfolio that changes each month. It 
                   is designed to take advantage of the hottest buyback stocks 
                   available. Subscribers get a monthly e-mail hotline with buy, 
                   sell and hold instructions, and access to charts tracking portfolio 
                   value. (

              more info

           <td align="center" bgcolor="#FFFFFF" class="Gradient_TableBody" height="120" valign="top">
            <font face="Georgia, Times New Roman, Times, serif" size="2">
             <br/>
             The Buyback Letter’s "Indexed Portfolios" have gained an average 706.11% since inception (March 1997). That’s an average 476.82% outperformance over the 229.29% gain in the S&amp;P 500 (as of 3/31/2018)!
            </font>
           </td>

                   Special Report
              </font>

            </strong>
           </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
           <td align="center" bgcolor="#FFFFFF" class="Gradient_TableBody" height="120" valign="top">
            <font face="Georgia, Times New Roman, Times, serif" size="2">
             <br/>
             A major study of the stock market over a 20 year period of time 
                   found that in each four year period,
             <strong>
              value buyback stocks
             </strong>
             (buyback stocks with high book-to-market ratios) generated returns 
                   388% higher than other stocks.
            </font>
           </td>
          </tr>

          <tr>
           <td align="center" bgcolor="#006699" class="Gradient_Section_Header" height="26" width="87%">
            <strong>
             <a href="what_is_buyback.asp" onmouseout="this.runtimeStyle.cssText='color:white';" onmouseover="this.runtimeStyle.cssText='color:#FF9933';" style="color:white">
              <font face="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size="3">
               What 
                   is a Buyback Stock?
              </font>
             </a>
            </strong>
           </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
           <td align="center" bgcolor="#FFFFFF" class="Gradient_TableBody" height="110" valign="top">
            <font face="Georgia, Times New Roman, Times, serif" size="2">
             <br/>
             For 50 years Buyback stocks have outperformed the market, sometimes 
                   spectacularly so. Here's what they are, and why they perform 
                   as well as they do.
             <br/>
            </font>
           </td>
          </tr>
         </table>
        </td>
        <td width="2%">

        <td width="49%">

          <tr>

                   Exclusive Buyback Strategy

                   company, we will separate rhetoric from reality, and show you 
                   how we have doubled our money* using our buyback stock strategy.
